titles.title: PROTECT for Rare Act
PROTECT for Rare Act
Providing Realistic Opportunity To Equal and Comparable Treatment for Rare Act

A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act and title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to provide for coverage of certain drugs used in the treatment or management of a rare disease or condition, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
